means: 预防( prevent的第三人称单数 )

sentence.Network_en: The condition prevents the blood from circulating freely.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种病阻碍了血液的循环畅通。

sentence.Network_en: She has a theory that drinking milk prevents colds.
sentence.Network_cn: 她有一种说法,认为喝牛奶能防止感冒.

sentence.Network_en: His disability prevents him from holding a job.

PerfectNetExp.abs: the safety catch prevents accidental folding ., 安全卡件可防止其意外折叠.
then the request is rejected. This prevents CSRF or any cross domain unauthorized function execution ., 那么请求被拒绝 . 这可以防止 CSRF 的或未经授权的任何跨域函数的执行.
They claim it prevents the dead man ' s troubled soul from walking abroad ., 他们声称这样可以阻止死者痛苦的灵魂四处游荡.
Spraying the around buildings with an insecticide also prevents insect buildup ., 建筑物周围喷洒杀虫药也能防止昆虫孳生.

list.abs: “4P”医学模式即预防性（Preventive）、预测性（Predictive）、个体化（Personalized）和参与性（participatory），比之前提到的“**” …
减少潜在照射概率的措施称为预防（prevention），降低剂量大小或严重程度的措施称为缓减（mitigation）；潜在照射发生前的防护 …
geologic features and disaster prevention for industrial square in xinglong mine ., 兴隆煤矿工广工程地质特征及灾害防治.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... inventive a 有创造能力的 prevent v 防止，阻止 preventive a 预防性的.
字典中止字的解释 ... (1) 停住,中断进程[ halt;stop] (4) 阻止,不让进行[ prevent] (8) 居住[ dwell].

entry.def: To prevent something means to ensure that it does not happen.

example.ex: Further treatment  will prevent cancer from developing...
example.tran: 进一步的治疗将阻止癌症恶化。

entry.def: To prevent someone from doing something means to make it impossible for them to do it.

example.ex: He said this would prevent companies from creating new jobs...
example.tran: 他说这将使公司无法创造新的工作机会。

example.ex: Its nationals may be prevented from leaving the country...
example.tran: 其国民可能会被禁止出境。
